programlisting:
<Input in1> Module im_null </Input>
<Input in2> Module im_null </Input>
<Processor p1> Module pm_null </Processor>
<Processor p2> Module pm_null </Processor>
<Output out1> Module om_null </Output>
<Output out2> Module om_null </Output>
<Route 1> # no processor modules Path in1 => out1 </Route>
<Route 2> # one processor module Path in1 => p1 => out1 </Route>
<Route 3> # multiple modules Path in1, in2 => p1 => p2 => out1, out2 </Route>
